snippet: By adopting tabletlike, touch-screen systems, automakers are integrating smartphones and online services with fewer complicated controls that frustrate and distract drivers.
abstract: Wheels column; automakers are beginning to use tablet computer-like systems to simplify dashboard controls for drivers, in effort to counteract driver distraction; Ford is installing new touch-screen, tabletlike system to replace its complex connected-car designs; integration of smartphones and online services into cars reflects profound transformation of vehicles.
lead_paragraph: By adopting tabletlike, touch-screen systems, automakers are integrating smartphones and online services with fewer complicated controls that frustrate and distract drivers.

headline.main: Carmakers Take a Hint From Tablets
headline.print_headline: Carmakers Take a Hint From Tablets
